name: UpdateIncidentCustomFields
description:
Update custom field values for a specific incident.

This tool updates custom field values for a given incident in PagerDuty. Requires 'incidents.write' OAuth scope.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: The ID of the incident to update custom field values.

parameters.name: incident_custom_fields
parameters.description: JSON object with custom field updates for the incident, including field names and their new values.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
